hero_paragraph1: The Evolution Collection Explores Emotional Growth Across Cultures and Ages From Infancy to Old Age.
hero_paragraph2: This phase symbolises the journey of emotional development, showing how the core emotions of joy, love, serenity, and pride evolve throughout human life.
info_paragraph: The Facial Action Coding System identifies visible muscle movements that represent emotional expressions. This collection shows how those Action Units appear across regions and genders.
